fr.jlc.polytech.scheduler.core

Class Capacity

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.jlc.polytech.scheduler.core.Capacity

  • public class Capacity
extends java.lang.Object
    Capacity is a class which represents a unit in byte. It contains a value (long) and a scale (kilo = 10^3, mega = 10^6, giga = 10^9, tera^12, or nothing for scale = 1).

        public static Capacity fromString(java.lang.String value)
        Parse a string to convert into a capacity
        Parameters:
        value - Value must be a capacity like "40G", "9", "50T", "400 ", ...
        Returns:
        Return the instance of the capacity
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Thrown when the string is not valid
